remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自，而且可以包含在。The class inherits from and can be contained in a . 提供來源檔案，包括已產生的檔案的唯一的識別碼。 provides the unique identification of source files, including files that have been generated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別。The following code example shows the use of the class. summary.span: 取得或設定 GUID，該 GUID 識別要使用的總和檢查碼演算法。

span.span: Gets or sets a GUID that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.

value.span: ，其識別要使用的總和檢查碼演算法。

span.span: A that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的 MD5 和 SHA1 雜湊演算法。Algorithms are provided for the MD5 and SHA1 hashes. 若要使用 MD5 雜湊的 GUID 值是 {0x406ea660、 0x64cf、 0x4c82、 0xb6，0xf0、 0x42，0xd4、 0x81，0x72、 0xa7，0x99}。The GUID value to use for the MD5 hash is {0x406ea660, 0x64cf, 0x4c82, 0xb6, 0xf0, 0x42, 0xd4, 0x81, 0x72, 0xa7, 0x99}. 若要使用 SHA1 雜湊的 GUID 是 {0xff1816ec、 0xaa5e、 0x4d10、 0x87，0xf7、 0x6f，方式 0x49、 0x63，0x83、 0x34，0x60}。The GUID to use for the SHA1 hash is {0xff1816ec, 0xaa5e, 0x4d10, 0x87, 0xf7, 0x6f, 0x49, 0x63, 0x83, 0x34, 0x60}. 總和檢查碼計算是特定語言。The calculation of the checksum is language-specific. 也就是語言廠商可以使用任何已知的偵錯工具的雜湊演算法來計算總和檢查碼。That is, the language vendor can use any of the hashing algorithms known to the debugger to calculate the checksum. 將這個屬性是 GUID 提供雜湊演算法的擴充性。The use of a GUID for this property provides hash algorithm extensibility. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的設定屬性。The following code example shows the setting of the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/CS/codedirective.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/VB/codedirective.vb#6)]
